title: Star Gaurdian Lux wonky hitboxes......
body:
Really need to fix the hitboxes for this skin. I've seen my snare literally pass through people and not hit them .... same with her ult. The animations\effects don't adequately visually represent where they are actually hitting at all.....

Shame because I'm loving the skin.

replies.body: Try posting this over in the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous). Generally, we here can't do anything about actually changing the game, but a red might, and they're generally more active over there.
